org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.authz.oauth2

Class OAuthWebViewDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Fragment
      • android.app.DialogFragment
        • org.jboss.aerogear.android.impl.authz.oauth2.OAuthWebViewDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.content.DialogInterface.OnCancelListener, android.content.DialogInterface.OnDismissListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class OAuthWebViewDialog
extends android.app.DialogFragment
    This is a WebView Dialog which is opened to a OAuth2 sign in page and sends data back to the calling activity.
